long: Meaning: "Jerushalaim" or "Jerushalem", the capital city of Palestine.  Usage: Jerusalem.  Source: rarely "יְרוּשָׁלַיִם"; a dual (in allusion to its two main hills (the true pointing, at least of the former reading, seems to be that of "H3390")); probably from (the passive participle of) "H3384" and "H7999"; "founded peaceful";
